description: Adds 12 new Burner items. New Burner inserters and stack inserter, All Burner Assembling Machines, Burner Mining Drill 2, Burner Pumpjack, Steel Furnace 2, Burner Oil Refinery, Burner Chemical Plant, Burner Centrifuge and Burner Lab.
